ibis.io
Class DummyInputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.InputStream
      ibis.io.DummyInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable
public class DummyInputStream
extends InputStream

An InputStream that can be placed on top of any existing java.io.InputStream. It adds statistics and prevents a close from propagating to the streams below. You need to use realClose() for that.
